posts.title: Welcome to Black on Foxtrots
posts.author: SapperCDR
posts.text: Welcome to Black on Foxtrots, a parody blog by and for the citizen soldiers of the Oregon National Guard.  We are looking forward to bringing you articles making light of current events in the Oregon Guard.  Comedy with a hint of truth makes the best satire.
